required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Consuming Enzymes and Prebiotics on Body Composition and Blood Biochemical Index
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Consuming Enzymes and Prebiotics on Body Composition and Blood Biochemical Index

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the effects of consuming enzymes and prebiotics on improvement of weight loss and biochemical parameters

primary_outcome.measure: The change of body fat mass
primary_outcome.description: The body fat mass (kg) was assessed by InBody770.
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of Triglyceride
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of Total cholestrol
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of HDL-cholestrol
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of LDL-cholestrol
Firmicutes, Bacteroidetes, Lactobucillius, and A. muciniphila were quantified by quantitative PCR.

primary_outcome.measure: The change of body mass index (BMI)
primary_outcome.description: BMI is a measurement of a person's leanness or corpulence based on their height and weight, and is intended to quantify tissue mass.The body mass index (BMI, kg/m^2) and body mass (kg) were assessed by InBody770.

primary_outcome.measure: The change of body fat percentage
primary_outcome.description: The body fat percentage (%) was assessed by InBody770.
The visceral fat (10 cm^2) was assessed by InBody770.

secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of fasting glycemia
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of aspartate aminotransferase
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of alanine aminotransferase
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of albumin
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of creatine
Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of uric acid

secondary_outcome.measure: The change of white blood cell
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood was sampled to measure concentrations of white blood cell

arm_group.arm_group_label: weight loss program kit with A. muciniphila prebiotics

intervention.description: Subjects should adhere to the eating plan, which contained the following kit components : four flavors of collagen drinks [i.e., Caviar Collagen Enzyme Drink, Collagen Enzyme Drinks (Peach Taste), Collagen Enzyme Drinks (Grape Fruit Taste), Saussurea involucrata Enzyme Drink (Litchi Taste)], six flavors of mike shakes (i.e., Corn Soup Mike Shake, Strawberry Mike Shake, Chocolate Mike Shake, Vanilla Mike Shake, Banana Mike Shakes, Matcha Mike Shakes), Fruit and Vegitable Congee, and Botanical Liquid Sachet.

intervention.intervention_name: weight loss program kit with A. muciniphila prebiotics
intervention.description: Subjects should adhere to the eating plan, which contained the following kit components : four flavors of collagen drinks [i.e., Caviar Collagen Enzyme Drink, Collagen Enzyme Drinks (Peach Taste), Collagen Enzyme Drinks (Grape Fruit Taste), Saussurea involucrata Enzyme Drink (Litchi Taste)], six flavors of mike shakes (i.e., Corn Soup Mike Shake, Strawberry Mike Shake, Chocolate Mike Shake, Vanilla Mike Shake, Banana Mike Shakes, Matcha Mike Shakes), Fruit and Vegitable Congee, Botanical Liquid Sachet, and Probiotics Liquid Sachet
intervention.arm_group_label: weight loss program kit with A. muciniphila prebiotics

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male or female aged between 20 and 50 years old
- Body mass index (BMI) â‰¥ 22 (kg/m^2) or body fat mass: male > 25%, female > 30%
- Prohibitions on other nutritional supplements (probiotics and prebiotics) before two weeks of the study
- Abidance by the similar diet and exercise habits over the study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant or breastfeeding woman
- Menopausal woman
- Diabetes mellitus
- Implementation in weight loss programs before a half year of this study
- Metabolic disorders
- Kidney diseases
- Liver diseases
- Cardiovascular diseases
- Nervous system diseases
- Gastrointestinal diseases
- Heavy drinking or constant drug use.

facility.name: National Pingtung University of Science and Technology
